nodes.text: The Celdaru system was a star system that was located within the Wild Space region of the galaxy. It lay outside the borders of space controlled by the New Republic in 12 ABY. The system shared its name with the epithet "Scourge of Celdaru," which was self-assumed by the Imperial technician Sulamar.
The Celdaru system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square I-8.
